Package com.ibm.mq.badge

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdvertManager
    Used to connect to topics to publish adverts of an Advertisable type.
    Cashier
    Used to connect to topics and queues to listen for messages and create appropriate responses.
    EnvSetter
    Deals with connections to MQ.
    EventManager
    Deals with the creation and alterations of Event's.
    Manager
    The purpose of this application is to demonstrate how MQ can be used in a ticket seller scenario.
    SevereHandler
    Handles severe logging messages in a more informative approach to the other log levels.
    StorageManager
    Responsible for writing data to a file in JSON and provides a file to other classes to read data.
